abstract: Donald J Trump has been summoned to serve jury duty in New York State Supreme Court in Manhattan and plans to report to court.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump has been summoned to serve in State Supreme Court, and he will report on Monday, an executive with his company said.

headline.main: Donald Trump Called to Jury Duty in Manhattan
headline.print_headline: Trump Called for Jury Duty in State Court on Monday

snippet: Mr. Trump has been summoned to serve in State Supreme Court, and he will report on Monday, an executive with his company said.
